data.eml:eml: The Pyraloidea (Lepidoptera) fauna of the woody savannah belt in Mali, West Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Poltavsky, Alexander N., Kravchenko, Vasiliy D., Traore, Mohammed M., Traore, Sekou F., Gergely, Petrányi, Witt, Thomas J., Sulak, Harry, Beck, T., Junnila, Amy, Revay, Edita E., Doumbia, Seydou, Beier, John C., Muller, Gunter C. (2018): The Pyraloidea (Lepidoptera) fauna of the woody savannah belt in Mali, West Africa. Zootaxa 4457 (1): 39-69, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.1.2
